abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Tonkachi
abilities.description: Luffy uses objects stuck to his feet or hands (in this case, wax) as hammers, swinging them down on opponents with great force.
abilities.firstUseContext: Used against Mr. 3, turning the agent's own wax into a weapon.

obtainedBy: Eaten by Luffy as a child

abilities.name: Candle Wall
abilities.description: Creates a wall of hardened wax for defensive purposes. The wax is as hard as steel but vulnerable to fire and heat.
abilities.firstUseContext: Used to defend against Luffy's attacks, but was broken through by Luffy's wax hammer technique.

abilities.name: Nose Fancy Double Cannon
abilities.description: Mr. 5 fires explosive boogers from both nostrils simultaneously, creating a more powerful explosive attack than his standard single-nostril shot.
abilities.firstUseContext: Used to attack Usopp and Karoo while they were fleeing.
